title: Proclaiming Christ in the Culture
itunes:title: Proclaiming Christ in the Culture
description: Friends, today's first reading makes it clear that if you are baptized, you are called to bring God's word to others. This week, I share five recommendations as you follow his calling as priest, prophet, and king.
content:encoded: Friends, today's first reading makes it clear that if you are baptized, you are called to bring God's word to others. This week, I share five recommendations as you follow his calling as priest, prophet, and king.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
